import React, { useMemo } from 'react'; import { useExpense } from '../context/ExpenseContext'; const Transactions = () => { const { transactions, selectedTransactions, toggleMyItem, clearMyItems, commitMyItems } = useExpense(); const rowKey = (t) => (t && (t.id ?? `${t.date}|${t.description}|${t.amount}`)); const isSelected = (t) => selectedTransactions.some((x) => rowKey(x) === rowKey(t)); // Show all selected items in the UI for immediate feedback const selectedTotal = useMemo( () => selectedTransactions.reduce((s, t) => s + (Number(t.amount) || 0), 0), [selectedTransactions] ); return (
